attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Apricots
attr.desc:
Apricots has nothing to do with apricots. It's a game where you fly a little plane around the screen and shoot things and drop bombs on enemy targets, and it's meant to be quick and fun.

Big thanks to [Moggers87](https://github.com/moggers87/apricots) for producing this game. 

The [source](https://github.com/moggers87/apricots)
attr.inst:
At present there is no option screen. Options can be changed by editing the configuration file apricots.cfg. This is first searched for in ~/.config/apricots/, then the system configuration directory (usually /usr/local/etc or /etc) and finally the default configuration in the data directory.

The number and type of planes can be varied, along with the airbases, as can 1/2 player game be chosen. The number of anti aircraft guns and scenery can be selected. Draks can be turned on or off, and a different condition for winning the game can be chosen.

The turn based combat system allows you to take your time and plan every move carefully. Upgrade your character with all sorts of items found in chests or dropped by enemies. This game is highly customizable for people with pixel art and/or programming experience.
attr.inst: Download the game https://store.steampowered.com/app/2688600/Descent_from_Arkovs_tower_Prologue/ and copy the exe file into game folder.

attr.title: Charge Kid
attr.desc: Charge Kid is a game where each jump is a puzzle. You can compare it to Portal, where you have to find clever uses of the mechanics and physics to "solve" each location by reaching the desired location. You have limited resources to make each jump, comparable to Celeste. But instead of focusing on precision-platforming, the game focuses on the puzzle aspect. Unlike Celeste, the hard part is figuring out how to use your resources to make each jump instead of the execution. But don't get fooled; the execution is also hard, which means finding each solution is even harder!

attr.title: Galaxy Forces 2
attr.desc:
A great multiplayer game brought to you by [Ronnie Hedlund](https://sourceforge.net/u/rh_galaxy/profile/). The source code is available [here.](https://sourceforge.net/p/galaxyv2/code/HEAD/tree/)

A 2D multiplayer space shooter, inspired by the Amiga classic Gravity Force. Play race, mission or dogfight. Single player, with friends or against AI. There are 50+ levels and a map-editor included.

Global hi-score and achievements with replays on the website.

Features

    Space shooter
    Multiplayer
    Online hiscore
    Replays
    Race
    Dogfight
    Mission
    AI
    Editor
    Cross platform
attr.inst:
Start the program

Multiple instances of the game may be started on the same machine for testing.
The server (Server.exe) need only be run if you want a stand alone server.
Firewall ports

TCP port 1999 needs to be forwarded in your firewall/router to be able to host games and have other players join you.
Login as member

To use achievements and hiscores you need to create a user here.
Then login as that user, or select cancel to just play directly.
Connect to server

Enter the IP address or host name of a server and click "connect".
You can enter 127.0.0.1 to connect to your own server.
All games on that server will be shown.
You can join green games.
You can't join red games, they are full or already started.
If no game is shown you have to create a new game.
Join existing game

Enter your name and choose a green game from the list.
Click "Join".
Create new game

Enter your name, and the name of the game.
Click "New".
Start game

The player that created the game should set the level to play and make other settings before starting the game. This player will be the master.
Others that have joined can only chat until the game starts.

The master can kick players by selecting a player and press delete.
If the master leaves the game, mastership is transferred to another player.

attr.title: Little Runmo
attr.desc:
Little Runmo - The Game, is a 2D platformer game originating from an animated Youtube film called "Little Runmo" made by the creator Gooseworx. The Story revolves around a fictional videogame character trying to survive with his last life.

The gameplay of Little Runmo - The Game, is based on the video but also takes inspiration from the Super Mario games. For fans that come from the animation, the game is not a 1 to 1 replica of the animated film. I am not trying to make this a hardcore Meatboy-type game, I want to introduce challenging moments but I will try to make the difficulty curve as smooth as possible.

The early game will be pretty chill, just imagine how the Mario games were designed, then newer harder mechanics get slowly introduced. Big inspirations again were Mario World and Super Mario Bros Wii and also a fan-game called Mario 63.

attr.title: LOVE by Fred Wood
attr.desc:
LOVE is a short and addictively challenging platformer with a minimalist design. It has a custom respawn system, 16 levels, 12 track original soundtrack, competitive scoring, and multiple ways to play.
The difficult levels are balanced with the inclusion of a simple yet unique respawn system wherein the player can leave a checkpoint at any location at any point, as long as they are on solid ground.
Beyond the visual aesthetic, the challenging level design, and the abundance of features, there is the fantastic soundtrack composed by James Bennett, which brings rich life to the seemingly simple three-color atmosphere.
attr.inst:
Purchase and download LOVE (3.0.1, Linux) or (3.0.1, Windows) from https://thatsmytrunks.itch.io/love.

attr.title: Luck be a Landlord
attr.desc: Your landlord is knocking on your door. You have one coin left to your name. You insert the coin into your slot machine...and...JACKPOT! Luck be a Landlord, tonight! Luck be a Landlord is a roguelike deck-builder about using a slot machine to earn rent money and defeat capitalism. This game does not contain any real-world currency gambling or microtransactions.
attr.inst:
You'll need to purchase the game from `https://store.steampowered.com/app/1404850/Luck_be_a_Landlord`. You'll need a specific release, which you can obtain using a tool like DepotDownloader (https://github.com/SteamRE/DepotDownloader). There are also GUIs for DepotDownloader, like https://depotdownloader.00pium.net. The command may vary depending on your system, but the `-app`, `-depot`, and `manifest` digits must match those below:

`./DepotDownloader -app 1404850 -depot 1404853 -manifest 5385995170406685945 -username <STEAM_USERNAME> -password <STEAM_PASSWORD>`

Once you've grabbed this, locate the *Luck be a Landlord.pck* file and place this in the port's *gamedata* folder.

Armed with over 20 sub-weapons. Dive into Time Attack Mode to unlock funky color palettes and discover secrets and cheats scattered throughout the digital landscape. The town is a bustling place so she'll need to be on the look out for potential customers, and they always tip well for a speedy delivery.

But watch out, Mimi! Angry crows are one thing, but flying a broom around town can be just as dangerous!

attr.title: Minetest
attr.desc: An open-source voxel sandbox game engine. Lots of free community-made games and mods to download straight from the client. Inspired by InfiniMiner, Minecraft, and the like.
attr.inst:
Ready to run.

Some menus extend off-screen for some devices, however all configuration options can be adjusted at `/path/to/your/ports/minetest/minetest.conf`. Settings options are described here: http://doxy.minetest.net/settings.html

Single-player play requires >1 GB in order to run both the host and client instances. So 1 GB devices should stick to server play because RAM requirements are only ~700 MB. There are public servers available or you can host your own private server!

attr.title: Mythos
attr.desc:
Esote is one of many small towns located within Daedalis's Great Labyrinth, formed years after the Legendary Hero Theseus defeated the awful minotaur. Although Theseus was able to escape the Labyrinth many of the remaining survivors who couldn't had to settle down resigning themselves to forever live trapped within. You (Sophos) have gotten fed up with the defeatist attitude all the townsmen carry on their faces, you hate the solemn and quiet atmosphere that persists day to day. After hearing tales of the Outside from your late parents years ago you decide to go see it for yourself. What is there to fear?
Make decisions and manipulate your escape chance. It's up to you whether you FIND THE EXIT or STAY LOST

attr.title: Neverball
attr.desc:
Tilt the floor to roll a ball through an obstacle course within the given time. If the ball falls or time expires, a ball is lost.

Collect coins to unlock the exit and earn extra balls. Red coins are worth 5. Blue coins are worth 10. A ball is awarded for 100 coins.

Includes Neverputt.
attr.inst:
All files are included and game is ready to run.

Dpad and left stick are movement
A is select/enter
B is back/escape
Select is escape
Start is enter

attr.title: Nidhogg
attr.desc:
Nidhogg is the epic award-winning fencing tug-of-war, full of graceful acrobatics and clumsy stabs. IRL yelling and excitement may occur, in this ultimate two-player showdown of fast-paced fencing and melee attacks.
The combat arena stretches in both directions, although besting an opponent only gains you ground. Matches aren’t won or lost with a single kill, but with a series of kills granting you right-of-way to run/fight/flee to your own goal-zone.
Each arena holds different strategic formations and chokepoints to use to your advantage. Until you reach your goal-zone, anything is possible. Only one thing is certain in Nidhogg… the only way to win is to outwit your opponent. En Garde!

Note: Only single player available for this port!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/94400/Nidhogg/
From your Steam Library, Right-Click Nidhogg and select Properties. Go to Betas and select "before_may_2017 - before_may_2017"
Download and install the before_may_2017 version. After installation is complete, from your steam library, Right-Click Nidhogg [before_may_2017] and select Manage > Browse local files
Copy all the files from this folder into ports/nidhogg/gamedata
On first startup, the game will patch and put the files in the appropriate places.

attr.title: No Parachute

But instead of crashing, he fell into a mysterious hole in the ground. He’ll have to fly through a lot of mines and tunnels and meet unexpected visitors. As the game progresses, the unsuccessful skydiver will have to use all his skill and reaction to survive. You will have very little time to assess the situation and make the right decisions, so be prepared to engage your entire concentration. Try to catch Zen (without burning your ass)!
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game https://store.steampowered.com/app/1575300/No_Parachute/ and copy the exe file into the port folder.

Run and jump your way through levels, find secrets and master your ability to dash. It's just you, the game and your tenacity to continue.
The game is short and sweet, but offers more content in the form of hunting collectibles and secrets.

attr.title: Ocean's Heart
attr.desc:
When pirates attacked Limestone Island, it fell to Tilia’s father to go after them and rescue the young woman they kidnapped. When he hasn’t returned six months later, Tilia decides it’s up to her to track down her dad and find out what went wrong.

Play as Tilia as she travels across an archipelago full of pirate forts, forgotten magic, abominable beasts, and a diverse cast of people trying to find their place in it all. As Tilia follows her dad’s trail, she becomes entrangled in the pirates’ plot to use an old magic to control the ocean. And maybe along the way, she’ll play in a tick-tack-toe championship, prevent an art heist, or impresonate a piano tuner. It’s a large world full of secrets, dangers, and quirky wierdos for you to explore.

attr.desc:
Pulstario is a small game in which you pilot a ship through the void and collect missing souls. It has challenging moments and hopefully the gameplay is a rewarding experience. From the creator of LOVE and kuso.

Pulstario is a short game that will likely take a player 30 minutes to complete the main game. There are also achievements, secret levels, and unlockable ship skins for the player to earn and collect.

The gameplay for Pulstario has been described as:

"Wobbly Free Range Pac-Man"
"Lunar Lander - Without the landing"
"Asteroids with gravity"
"Luftrausers for Pacifists"
attr.inst:
Purchase and download Pulstario_Linux_DRMFree_V001.zip OR Pulstario_Windows_DRMFree_V001.zip from https://thatsmytrunks.itch.io/pulstario.
Copy all the files (game.unx/data.win, options.ini) from /assets or the zip into the pulstario/gamedata folder

attr.title: PuPaiPo Space Deluxe
attr.desc:
PuPaiPo Space is a colorful space shoot-em-up in which you travel from Stage to Stage in search of the legendary space pizza. Piloting your trusty spaceship, you will have to battle waves of opponents, dodge hundreds of bullets, pick sweet power ups and face powerful bosses!

Travel through 7 different stages. Jumping from one stage to another requires your space jumping engine to recharge for roughly 90 seconds. During that time you will have to defend yourself from all the opponents in the area and defeat its boss.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://bolhut.itch.io/pupaipo-space-deluxe or from https://store.steampowered.com/app/1148500/PuPaiPo_Space_Deluxe/

Itch:
Download PuPaiPo Space DX - Linux and copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/pupaipospacedx/gamedata

Steam:
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 1148500 1148502 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/pupaipospacedx/gamedata

attr.title: Pure Metal: Feature 1
attr.desc: Base has been attacked and you are the last hope of saving Pure Metal. Shoot down hoards of enemies and unforgiving bosses in classic shooter style. Touch controls feature smooth analog from the onscreen D-pad. Use the arrow keys and the z and x buttons to shoot the enemy with the keyboard. You have one life to make it through each level, but don't worry your ship can take 3 consecutive hits before being destroyed. Also your ship will regenerate to full power if you can manage to avoid enemy fire long enough. Bob and weave your way through the enemy fire and kill every thing in site. This game is designed to brutally come after you but pay attention and look for the patterns and avoid the onslaught of bullets.
attr.inst: Just copy the game.win or data.win inside the gamedata folder. Windows store version works too.

attr.title: Putrid Shot Ultra
attr.desc: A chaotic shoot-em-up roguelite with magic spell casting. Defeat enemies with your gun! Stack tons of passive spells that trigger when you shoot while weaving your unique active spell in between. Blast your enemies with gunfire and magic spells while you dodge through the rubble.
attr.inst: Download the game (demo or full version) https://store.steampowered.com/app/2053360/PUTRID_SHOT_ULTRA/ and copy the exe file into the port folder.

attr.title: Puztrix Playdate
attr.desc: Puztrix Playdate is the Playdate version of a remake of the Gravnic game from inside the NES Puzznic game.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Pyk
attr.desc: Quick abstract arcade game that requires good reflexes and dexterity but sometimes patience and precision. You control a round being that must avoid Bad Red Shapes. Those enemies will try to cut, smash, shoot, crush, wreck, burn, or shatter you -- so be quick and careful. Collect all keys to unlock blockades and find the teleporter to next level.
attr.inst: You can download Pyk for free at: https://rafalkowalski.itch.io/pyk. Download the *Pyk_1.0.zip* (Windows) version and extract it, and place the *pyk.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: Quake 1
attr.desc: Quake 1 is one of the first fully 3D First-person shooter games released by id software.
attr.inst: Includes shareware pak file.  You can add your own full game pak files to the ports/quake/quakepaks/id1 folder.

attr.title: Quake 2
attr.desc: Quake 2 is the sequel to Quake 1, one of the first fully 3D First-person shooter games released by id software.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files to the ports/quake2/baseq2 folder.

attr.title: Quake 3
attr.desc: Quake III Arena is a 1999 multiplayer-focused first-person shooter developed by id Software.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files and product key to the ports/quake3/baseq3 folder.

attr.title: Quakespasm
attr.desc:
QuakeSpasm is a modern, cross-platform Quake game engine by sezero based on FitzQuake. This source port of quake supports many mods and Dimension of the Machine.

Quakespasm-for-GL4ES (https://github.com/Slayer366/quakespasm-for-GL4ES) based on (https://github.com/jfgomez21/quakespasm) who began modifying Quakespasm to work with GL4ES.
attr.inst: You will need to populate the id1, hipnotic, rogue, dopa, ad, and mg1 directories with your pak files and music tracks.  Some JelOS users may need to use flac instead of ogg or mp3.  It is recommended to use an RK3566 or faster CPU to run Arcane Dimensions or Dimension of the Machine.

attr.title: R&Watch-Dobtopus
attr.desc: A tight boss rush that's a challenge without being too brutal. The graphics have a sleek minimalist style with loads of visual flairs.
attr.inst: -Download at (https//:nizakashii.itch.io/R&Watch)-Extract and place data.win into gamedata folder

attr.title: Rakuen
attr.desc: Rakuen is an adventure game about a little Boy who lives in the hospital. One day, the Boy asks his Mom to escort him to the fantasy world from his favorite storybook, so that he can ask the Guardian of the Forest to grant him one wish. In order to receive his wish, the Boy must complete a set of challenges that revolve around helping his neighbors in the hospital by interacting with their alter-egos in the fantasy world...
attr.inst: Add the contents of your rakuen copy into the rakuen/gamedata/ folder.

attr.title: Raptor
attr.desc: Reversed-engineered source port from Raptor Call Of The Shadows
attr.inst: Shareware files are included and game is ready to run. See readme for detailed instructions for full version game files and other configuration options. In the name and callsign section, make sure the crosshair is not on input fields, press start + down to enable text entry. Press start once done to complete entry.

attr.title: RAWGL
attr.desc: A re-implementation of the engine used in the game Another World aka Out of this World in the US.
attr.inst: Includes the Out of this World demo files.  You can add your own full game files to the ports/rawgl/gamedata/ folder.  See https://github.com/cyxx/rawgl#supported-versions for more supported files info.

attr.title: Red Handsome Hood
attr.desc:
Join Red Handsome Hood on his journey, having only his hood, thong and knuckles, there is nothing that can stop this strong man! Or is there? The path is full of dangerous opponents, but he is just as dangerous!

The charming run of an untold tale, but we are not going to tell it, YOU can tell us what you think the story is about!
attr.inst:
This port is ready to run.
Special thanks to BolHut games and and Jaime Gifte(@GIFTEador) for allowing the distribution of the game via PortMaster 
Source: https://bolhut.itch.io/red-handsome-hood

attr.title: Redneck Rampage 1
attr.desc: Redneck Rampage 1 using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version REDNECK.GRP and REDNECK.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-redneck1/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Redneck Rampage 2
attr.desc: Redneck Rampage 2 using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version REDNECK.GRP and REDNECK.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-redneck2/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Relic Hunters
attr.desc: Relic Hunters Zero: Remix is a remaster of the FREE 1 million player hit game about blasting evil space ducks and turtles with tiny cute guns. It's fast, it's tactical, and feels deliciously smooth to play. Unlock new weapons, characters and relics to defeat the Ducan Commander!
attr.inst: Download game from https://www.gog.com/en/game/relic_hunters_zero_remix, install, copy data.win and .dat files to /ports/relichunters/gamedata

attr.title: Reminiscence
attr.desc: A reimplementation of the Flashback game using the reminiscence engine by Alex Chermenin.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the PC version copied to ports/reminiscence/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Restore PortMaster
attr.desc: Restore PortMaster is a script designed to restore a broken PortMaster installation.
attr.inst: Download this "Port" then run the "Restore PortMaster.sh" from within your Ports Directory. This will restore PortMaster to the latest stable version with default settings.

attr.title: Retro Time
attr.desc: RetroTime is a game containing 8 retro based games playable in 3 game modes being Retro Carousel, Time Attack and Lives mode.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Return to Castle Wolfenstein
attr.desc: Return to Castle Wolfenstein using the iortcw project.  With porting work done by JohnnyonFlame.  Packaged by Romadu.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own pak0.pk3, sp_pak1.pk3, sp_pak2.pk3, and sp_pak3.pk3 to the ports/iortcw/main folder.

attr.title: Ri-li
attr.desc: A simple and fun arcade-style game in which you control a wooden toy train and collect wooden letters while avoiding obstacles.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Rick Dangerous
attr.desc: An open source implementation of the legendary game "Rick Dangerous" using the xrick libretro retroarch core.
attr.inst: All necessary files are already included.

attr.title: Rigel Engine
attr.desc: A modern re-implementation of the classic DOS game Duke Nukem II.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full game files to the ports/RigelEngine/ folder.

attr.title: Rise Of The Triad
attr.desc: An open source port of Rise of the Triad by icculus.
attr.inst: The demo files are already included.

attr.title: RITE
attr.desc: RITE is a high-speed precision platformer where you must conquer a series of demanding trials, a rite of passage for every Nim. Find the key and reach the exit to move on to the next trial, and maybe collect some gold along the way. Who knows, they could prove valuable to those who like a brutal challenge..
attr.inst: Locate the data.win file from the windows version of RITE. Copy this file to the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Rlone: A Rogue Clone
attr.desc:
Rlone is a real-time rogue clone. The result of a 2 week, friendly competition to create a roguelike using whatever tools we desired. 

This game features procedural map generation, random weapon and enemy stats, and difficulty and complexity scaling as you descent further into lower floors. It also supports modifications to the graphics, audio, and other things through the config files in "res/cfg/".
attr.inst: Ready to run

attr.title: Rlvm
attr.desc: Rlvm is a Free Software reimplementation of the Key RealLive interpreter for Visual Novels. Notable games include CLANNAD, AIR, & KANON.
attr.inst: Add your game files to the ports/rlvm/games/GAME_NAME directory, multiple games can be installed and you will get a choice of which game you want to play at launch. HD Releases do not currently work properly.

attr.title: Road Invaders
attr.desc: An action game that's part vertical-scrolling racer, part match-2 game. Move your car and punch cubes, matching cubes to shift gear on your way to achieving the highest score!
attr.inst: Game files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Rocks N Diamonds
attr.desc: A Boulderdash type game by Holger Schemel with many unique features, such as the ability to play remade levels from Boulderdash, Emerald Mine and Supaplex and many more levels.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Roguelight
attr.desc: The deeper you travel the darker it gets, and you only have your arrows to light the way.
attr.inst: Download game from https://managore.itch.io/roguelight. The .exe download is actually a compressed archive; open it 7-zip or some other archiver to extract the files. Copy data.win and .mp3 files to /ports/roguelight/gamedata

attr.title: ROTA
attr.desc:
Rotate gravity as you walk over the edge!
Push, pull and rotate gravity-blocks to traverse the stage and solve puzzles.
Collect all 50 gems to unlock doors and explore 8 vibrant worlds!
Listen to an original ambient soundtrack that will keep you relaxed while solving challenging puzzles. (:
Watch out for spikes! 0:
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Rotational Shift
attr.desc: A team of workers are tasked with processing boxes and have to meet the quota in the time limit. The catch? Every time the wheel spins, a worker is selected at random to work the next shift. With such short margins, all workers must play a part in helping each other be as effective as possible, so that no second is wasted.
attr.inst: Download game from https://gleeson.itch.io/rotational-shift. Place data.win in /ports/rotationalshift/gamedata

attr.title: Russian Subway Dogs
attr.desc: A fast-paced arcade game inspired by the real-life stray dogs of the Moscow metro. Juggle vodka, bark fire, cook bears, and more! Can you steal enough food to survive?
attr.inst: Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/762610/Russian_Subway_Dogs/ copy data.win and all .ini files to /ports/russiansubwaydogs/gamedata

attr.title: RVGL
attr.desc: An open source port of Re-Volt by the RV Team.
attr.inst: Necessary files will be downloaded and installed upon initial launch while connected to the internet.

attr.title: Satryn
attr.desc: A chaotic, infinite twin stick shooty! 12 fearsome baddies (not cuddly), 9 power-ups that will make you smile and say “i’m having fun”, 5 hazards that add to the chaotic nature of this strange place, a manual that reveals helpful hints and useless lore as you discover things, and the love of your friends makes you stronger
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: Savant Ascent
attr.desc:
A malicious orb has cast Savant out of his tower and transformed his surroundings into dangerous enemies!

Dodge and shoot your way back up the tower, and blast down waves of enemies as you make your way towards the top! As you progress, you unlock CDs that not only give you new tracks to play to, but also grant you powerful new abilities!

Can you make it to the top?
attr.inst:
Make sure to buy the original version of Savant Ascent: https://store.steampowered.com/app/259530/Savant__Ascent/

Note: dual analog sticks are required for this game!

Go to your steam directory and copy all files from Savant Ascent into the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Scale the Skull Tower
attr.desc: Can you climb the tower and defeat the evil necromancer? Jump from ledge to ledge and throw your sword into walls to make MORE LEDGES! Also, bounce on some slimes.
attr.inst: You can download Scale the Skull Tower for free at: https://cortok.itch.io/scaletheskulltower. Download the *Scale the Skull Tower JAM VERSION (LINUX).zip* version and extract it, and place the *Game.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: SDL Sopwith
attr.desc: SDL Sopwith is a port of the game Sopwith, which was originally by BMB CompuScience Canada.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: SDLPoP
attr.desc: An open-source port of Prince of Persia, based on the disassembly of the DOS version, extended with new features by NagyD
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Secret Tea Garden
attr.desc: A cozy looking Tea Party where you must serve townspeople their tea while dodging hurdles and maneuvering around obstacles.
attr.inst: Download from https://angusbeer.itch.io/Secret-Tea-Garden then extract and place data.win into gamedata folder
attr.inst_md: Download from [Angus Beer](https://angusbeer.itch.io/secret-tea-garden) then extract and place data.win inside gamedata folder

attr.title: Serious Sam - The First Encounter
attr.desc: Serious Sam is a high-adrenaline arcade-action shooter heavily focused on frantic arcade-style single player action. Sam travels through the beautiful world of ancient Egypt and several diverse planets, confronting countless Mental’s minions on his way to the Mental’s base. This source port of Serious Sam was originally modded to work on the Dragonbox Pyra handheld. GL video accelerated with GL4ES by ptitseb (same dev who also does box86 and box64)!
attr.inst: You will need to populate the sstfe directory with your game data.  Copy all contents except the 'Bin' folder from your Serious Sam - The First Encounter Classic GOG, Steam, or CD install and DO NOT overwrite existing files.  The Serious Sam Classics: Revolution copy of The First Encounter works, too

attr.title: Serious Sam - The Second Encounter
attr.desc: Serious Sam is a high-adrenaline arcade-action shooter heavily focused on frantic arcade-style single player action. Sam travels through the beautiful world of ancient Egypt and several diverse planets, confronting countless Mental’s minions on his way to the Mental’s base. This source port of Serious Sam was originally modded to work on the Dragonbox Pyra handheld. GL video accelerated with GL4ES by ptitseb (same dev who also does box86 and box64)!
attr.inst: You will need to populate the sstse directory with your game data.  Copy all contents except the 'Bin' folder from your Serious Sam - The Second Encounter Classic GOG, Steam, or CD install and DO NOT overwrite existing files.  The Serious Sam Classics: Revolution copy of The Second Encounter works, too

attr.title: Seven Kingdoms - Ancient Adversaries
attr.desc: A long, long time ago, when people lived among gods and monsters, seven kingdoms struggled for rule over the land. Lead one of those civilizations to glory through sophisticated trade, diplomacy, espionage and conquest. Choose from one of seven cultures: Greek, Persian, Viking, Norman, Mayan, Chinese and Japanese and compete for domination. Each Race in Seven Kingdoms has its own distinct advantages and disadvantages, its own unique God unit, a different military skill, its own strengths and weaknesses. Learn how to use them! Use military means, economy or subterfuge to bring down your enemies. And don't forget about brute force, cunning and intelligence.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Shadow Warrior
attr.desc: Shadow Warrior open source port by Jonathan Fowler.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version SW.GRP and SW.RTS Shadow Warrior files to the ports/shadow-warrior folder.

attr.title: Shippy
attr.desc: The Earth is under attack. The only trained pilots, Sora and Fumiko, race to defeat the invaders. The experimental ships are Earth only hope.
attr.inst: Can play in one or two player mode

attr.title: Shipwreck
attr.desc: Shipwreck is a top down adventure game in which you must travel the land, explore dungeons, and defeat monsters to earn safe passage off the island on which you are stranded.  Note there are several games called Shipwreck, this is the one by Brushfire Games.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Shipwreck for Linux copied to the ports/shipwreck/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove
attr.desc: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove loader.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Shovel Knight Treasure Trove for Linux copied to the ports/shovelknight/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Shrubnaut
attr.desc:
A small metroidvania made in 6 days for a self-imposed GAME-A-WEEK challenge by gleeson.
Use your hookshot to explore a space garden and find all the secrets!

Note: This is a short game, intended to be played in one sitting. Note that there is no save function and the game resets to the beginning after idling for 30 seconds
attr.inst:
Download SHRUBNAUT - Windows.zip from https://gleeson.itch.io/shrubnaut and place the data.win from the zip into /ports/shrubnaut/gamedata.
On first startup, the game will patch the data.win

attr.title: Siege of Osaka

attr.title: Simple Sokoban

attr.title: SkiJump3

attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Snaklipse

attr.title: SneakR

attr.inst: Download game from https://josephgribbin.itch.io/sneakr, rename SneakR.exe to SneakR.zip, extract. Copy data.win to /ports/sneakr/gamedata

attr.title: SNKRX
attr.desc: SNKRX is an arcade shooter roguelite where you control a snake of heroes that automatically attack nearby enemies. Combine different heroes to unlock class bonuses and create unique builds, and steer your unstoppable party as they ravage through endless waves of enemies.
attr.inst: Download the game https://store.steampowered.com/app/915310/SNKRX/ and place SNKRX.exe file to the port folder

attr.title: SnOut
attr.desc:
Compete for the top score in this combination of two classic arcade games!
The idea Is Simple:
-You control the snake
-Gain length (and points) for the ball hitting your body
-Body hits power up the ball to destroy blocks and create space
-Just go for as long as you can!
You lose if your head hits the ball, the wall, or your own body!
attr.inst:
This port is ready to run!
If your D-pad on your device is poor, go to Menu->Options->Control Scheme: L/R to switch controls to triggers.

attr.desc: It's like Sokoban but you're really strong.

attr.desc: A reversed engineered version Space Cadet Pinball.

attr.title: Spearmint Mountain
attr.desc:
Spearmint Mountain is a short but sweet action platformer, where you take control of a sentient piece of mint that's fallen off the big, sacred Mint. Pick up spear plants, and poke them at enemies or they'll crush you! Throw the spears at walls to create platforms, and bounce off of them to reach new heights!

There are also collectible mint coins hidden in difficult-to-reach locations. How many can you find?
attr.inst: Download game (Spearmint Mountain 1.1.1 Ubuntu) from https://baku.itch.io/spearmint-mountain, copy all the files from /assets to /ports/spearmintmountain/gamedata

attr.title: Spectral Slash
attr.desc: A combat-focused deckbuilder where your weapon deals no damage. Slash enemies to gain energy, use energy to play powerful cards. Add creative modifiers to your cards! Build a  powerful deck! Each loadout has unique playstyle. Try out all 6 loadouts and see which one you like most!
attr.inst: Download the game https://abhimonk.itch.io/spectral-slash and place SpectralSlash.exe file to the port folder

attr.title: Spell Sling
attr.desc: Spell Sling is a classic first-person roguelike with a focus on consumable spells and dungeon crawling
attr.inst: Download the game https://youdoyoubuddy.itch.io/spell-sling and copy the exe file into the port folder.

attr.title: Spell Tower
attr.desc: Spell Tower is a first person dungeon crawler and deckbuilder hybrid with the usual assortment of interesting card interactions, broken combos and cards with uses you might not have thought of at first.
attr.inst: Download the game https://youdoyoubuddy.itch.io/spell-tower and copy the exe or love file into the port folder.

attr.title: Spelunky
attr.desc: Spelunky Classic HD.  A modified version of Derek Yu's game Spelunky Classic. Based on the source code published in Humble Weekly Bundle: Play and Create with GameMaker (not original 1.1 release).

attr.title: Spinch
attr.desc: Transcend the material realm and assume your true form as Spinch, a hyper-agile organism consumed by the quest to rescue a litter of its missing offspring, in this side-scrolling, psychedelic platformer from the mind of award-winning Canadian cartoonist, Jesse Jacobs.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/794240/Spinch/ (also available but not tested from gog and humble). Copy data.win, all .ogg and .ini files to /ports/spinch/gamedata

attr.title: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com
attr.desc: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com is a small metroidvania about a ghost hunter named Ruby. One Halloween night a ghost hunting job comes in, but it turns out to not be a regular gig!

attr.title: Star vs. the Game

File structure:
/roms/ports/wakingmars/gamedata/wakingmars_files
/roms/ports/wakingmars/gamedata/wakingmars.png

attr.title: Waternet
attr.desc: Waternet is a puzzle game where you to connect pipes to each other so that water flows through it.
attr.inst: All files included!

attr.title: Wetspot 2
attr.desc: A port of QuickBasic 4.5 game Wetspot 2 by Angelo Mottola.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Widelands
attr.desc:
A real-time build-up strategy game
You are the regent of a small clan. Your task is to build an ever growing settlement. Every member of your clan will do his or her part to produce more resources to further this growth.

Widelands offers a single-player mode with campaigns that tell stories of the tribes and their struggle in the Widelands universe. However, settling really starts when you unite with friends over the Internet or LAN to build up new empires together – or to crush each other in the dusts of war. Widelands also offers an artificial intelligence to challenge you.
attr.inst:
All game files included, optional Mods can be installed at will.
Main Menu Windows can be dragged if screen is too small.

attr.title: Wizard Orb
attr.desc: A challenging little puzzle-platformer game where platforms appear and disappear each time you leap.
attr.inst: You can download Wizard Orb for free at: https://slimewitch.itch.io/wizard-orb. Download the *windows.zip* version and extract it, and place the *index.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: Wizardchase
attr.desc:
2D retro pacman like arcade game

Collect all the treasure in the dungeon!  Can you make it to the second level? 
Leave your highest score in the comments.  Good luck!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Wizznic
attr.desc: Wizznic! is an open-source, freeware remake of Puzznic, recreating the original arcade levels, the NES ones and including fan-made puzzle packs with new custom levels. The gameplay remains exactly the same, where the player has to move individual tiles, arranging them inside a restricted space to create groups of identical blocks and make all disappear by touching each other. Elevators and other features gradually start to appear on later levels.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play

attr.title: Wordle SDL
attr.desc:
Wordle SDL is a port of a clone of Wordle made with SDL.

Wordle is a web-based word game created and developed by Welsh software engineer Josh Wardle, and owned and published by The New York Times Company since 2022. Players have six attempts to guess a five-letter word, with feedback given for each guess in the form of colored tiles indicating when letters match or occupy the correct position.
attr.inst: All files are included and ready.

attr.title: World of Goo
attr.desc: World of Goo is a multiple award winning physics based puzzle / construction game made entirely by two guys. Drag and drop living, squirming, talking, globs of goo to build structures, bridges, cannonballs, zeppelins, and giant tongues. The millions of Goo Balls that live in the beautiful World of Goo are curious to explore - but they don't know that they are in a game, or that they are extremely delicious.
attr.inst: Copy your GOG World of Goo .sh into the Port folder or copy your Linux Game files (WorldOfGoo.bin.x86_64 renamed to WorldOfGoo.bin and GameFolder) to the worldofgoo gamedata folder.

attr.title: World War II GI
attr.desc: World War 2 GI using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version WW2GI.GRP and WW2DI.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-WWII/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Worship Vector
attr.desc: Worship Vector is a Tower Defense type game. The game is based upon a unique map, which extends automatically.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Xenon Valkyrie
attr.desc: Xenon Valkyrie is a rogue-like with many RPG elements in which you will have to get to the deepest part of a moon and finish the plans of a wicked witch. You will be able to get many weapons randomly as you fight in a world that is created every time you play.
attr.inst:
Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/573780/Xenon_Valkyrie/,
copy copy data.win, all .ogg and .ini files to /ports/xenonvalkyrie/gamedata

attr.title: xkcd Hoverboard
attr.desc: Standalone version of xkcd 1608 Hoverboard game
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Y E L L O W - J A C K E T
attr.desc: Y E L L O W - J A C K E T (or just yellow jacket) is a vaporwave arcade shoot-em-up about a motorcyclist running from the government in this classic 80s style arcade shmup! Can you get the highest score?
attr.inst: Download the game on itch.io page and retrieve the file data.win from the Y E L L O W - J A C K E T.zip. After, data.win needs to be place on to the folder ports/yellowjacket/gamedata.

attr.title: Yarntown
attr.desc: You’ve come on the night of the hunt. The streets of this cursed, gothic town are overrun with beasts, and what has become of the men who tried to hunt them before. Explore the twisting roads, go toe to toe with powerful foes, and uncover Yarntown’s dark secrets.
attr.inst: Download game from https://solarus-games.org/games/yarntown/ and put the .solarus file in ports/yarntown.

attr.title: Yatka
attr.desc:
YATKA is one of many Tetris implementations available. Motivation behind this one was, on the one hand, to create a game that would conform to modern rules of the game, while, on the other, to make possible running it on resource-limited platforms (e.g. Bittboy or JZ4760-based handheld consoles).
Two Classic themes by Tekkenfede included.
attr.inst: All file included, boot the game and play

youdiedbanry.zip.name: youdiedbanry.zip
items: You Died But a Necromancer Revived You.sh

attr.title: You Died But a Necromancer Revived You
attr.desc:
You Died ... but a Necromancer revived you! And will keep bringing you back to their crazy tower of death until you reach the top floor and get rid of them, allowing you to finally be free...
Can you stop this madness?
Or will you give up?
Reaching the top is no easy feat!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://bolhut.itch.io/you-died-but-a-necromancer-revived-you OR https://store.steampowered.com/app/1037100/You_Died_but_a_Necromancer_revived_you/

Steam:
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 1037100 1037102 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/youdiedbanry/gamedata

Itch:
Download YouDied_BaNRY_linux.zip an copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/youdiedbanry/gamedata

attr.title: You Have 10 Seconds (2023)
attr.desc:
You Have 10 Seconds is a fast paced arcade platformer where you’re spawned into a level and given ten seconds to work out how to reach the exit without dying before time runs out.

There are 25 Areas which each introduce a new mechanic to the gameplay, eventually creating extremely complex and difficult levels. Master collecting keys, swimming through acid, dodging motion sensors, time traveling, swapping dimensions, and so much more to clear areas as quickly as possible.
attr.inst:
Claim the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2390510/You_Have_10_Seconds_2023/
Download the game and copy all the game files from /You Have 10 Seconds (2023) into youhave10s2023/gamedata

attr.title: Zelda Navi's Quest
attr.desc:
At the end of the Time of Triumph, Link left Hyrule to take well-deserved holidays far from the kingdom's restlessness. Link set sail to discover distant lands and paradise islands where he gladly spent the many rupees he had borrowed from the princess.

Yet, his holiday took a decisive turn on a small island where he heard interesting rumours.

Those rumours were about a very special island, the most fabulous beach resort, the marvellous Fairy Island. Link was very curious about it, and set sail again to see it by himself.

But what he found there wan't quite what he expected: a quick and painful death killed by a sea monster. His body was washed ashore on a beach...
attr.inst:
RTR
To continue dialogues you need to press accept. 
Also to go after the boot image

attr.title: Zelda Oni Link Begins
attr.desc: Brought down by a terrible curse since his recent victory on the Dark Lord, Link is changing, day by day, into a powerful creature with a destructive nature named Oni-Link. Bannished from Hyrule, the young hylian asks the princess Zelda some help. She shows him his last hope: a portal to a secret world.
attr.inst:
RTR
To continue dialogues you need to press accept. 
Also to go after the boot image

attr.desc: After the events that occured in Termina and the victory of the hero on his evil alter-ego, Zelda and Link knew that, from the bottom of hell, Ganon the immortal drawed his power from his wish to the Triforce, and rounded up his army with a view to invade Hyrule. Until the day when, after months spent watching out for an attack, an event came up and put an end to this endless waiting...

attr.title: ZeroRanger
attr.desc: ZeroRanger is a vertically scrolling 2D shoot'em up with heavy emphasis on shooting, dodging and... mystery?
attr.inst: To start the game copy the data.win/game.unx and all the ogg files inside the gamedata folder, then boot the game from the ports menu on your device.

attr.title: ZGloom
attr.desc: ZGloom is a re-implementation of Amiga FPS Gloom, including support for Gloom 3, Gloom Deluxe and Zombie Massacre.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to run.

attr.title: Ziggurat
attr.desc: A short adventure game featuring a dreamy atmosphere and strange characters.
attr.inst: You can download Ziggurat for free at: https://nethead.itch.io/ziggurat. Download the *Ziggurat-Linux.zip* version and extract it, and place the *Ziggurat.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: Znax
attr.desc: Znax is a remake of a game by Nick Kouvaris. It is a sort of puzzle / arcade game where you as the player need to select 4 blocks of the same color and form rectangles as big as you can
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.
